parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the headlights can cause reduced visibility, increased risk of accidents, and potential safety hazards, especially when driving at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: Headlights constantly go out while driving
headlights malfunction and burn out
headlights do not turn on
headlights flicker
bulbs need to be replaced frequently
wiring harness melts
headlight assembly connection melts
bulbs explode inside the headlight assembly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power window mechanism can cause the window to become stuck or fall into the door, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Windows will not go up
windows become stuck
windows fall into the door
cracking sound when trying to operate the window
plastic clips holding the window break.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power window switch can cause the window to become stuck or inoperable, which can lead to inconvenience and potential safety issues.
symptoms: Switches break off
switches become inoperable
windows will not go up or down.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Blind Spot Issue with Rear View Mirror and A Pillar
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design of the rear view mirror and A pillar can create a severe blind spot, which can lead to accidents or injuries when making turns.
symptoms: Severe blind spot when making left turns
view of vehicles in front is completely blocked by mirror and pillar.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the air conditioner can cause discomfort and distraction while driving, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: Air conditioner stops working
leak in the air compressor valve.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the driver's seat anchor can cause the seat to break loose or move unexpectedly, leading to a loss of control, increased risk of accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The driver's seat feels loose or wobbly
the seat moves unexpectedly during acceleration or braking
the seat breaks loose from its track
the seat tips up or down
the driver is forced into an unusual position
the driver loses contact with the steering wheel or pedals.
